snippet.title: Damascus Gear: Operation Tokyo [Gameplay Trailer]
snippet.description:
Title: Damascus Gear: Operation Tokyo
Platform: PlayStation Vita | PSN
Genre: Mech-Action RPG
Players: 1
PlayStation TV Compatible: Yes
Price: $14.99 USD
Release Date: March 24, 2015 (US, Brazil, Chile, Ecuador, Honduras, Paraguay, Canada, Argentina, Colombia, El Salvador, Nicaragua, Peru, Mexico, Bolivia, Costa Rica, Guatemala, Panama, Uruguay)

Click here for more information: 

Offical English Site: http://arcsystemworksu.com/
Official Japanese Site: http://ArcSystemWorks.jp
Facebook: https://facebook.com/arcsystemworksu
Twitter: https://twitter.com/arcsystemworksu
